Animator_LivingPicture.NAME: 活着的油画
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合一次每当协同生效时抽1张牌.

Animator_TheMissingPiece.NAME: 缺失部分
DESCRIPTIONS: 场战斗,获得一次同系列卡牌的奖励机会.

Animator_PurgingStone.NAME: 解咒石
Animator_PurgingStone.FLAVOR: 人类无法对抗诅咒，但可以利用它.
DESCRIPTIONS: 你可以 放逐 掉某些牌系列使它们不再出现. 击败boss后获得额外使用次数.

Animator_CerealBox.NAME: Cereal Box
Animator_CerealBox.FLAVOR: Whole Grain Guaranteed! Approved by Konayuki.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right Click to Heal #b1 HP. NL Starts at #b20 uses, gain #b5 uses when entering a shop room. NL You can store up to #b30 uses.

Animator_WizardHat.NAME: Wizard Hat
Animator_WizardHat.FLAVOR: Explosion magic is the strongest magic. But that also means it takes time to prepare.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you activate 7 #ySynergies in a combat, deal 14 damage to ALL enemies.

Animator_AlchemistGlove.NAME: Alchemist Glove
Animator_AlchemistGlove.FLAVOR: Allows you to control fire with the snap of a finger.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 3 turns, apply 2 #yBurning to ALL enemies.

Animator_HallowedScabbard.NAME: Hallowed Scabbard
Animator_HallowedScabbard.FLAVOR: The holder of the scabbard is granted potent healing, allowing for critical and fatal wound to be rapidly repaired.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, if you lose 15 HP or more in a turn, gain 5 #yRegeneration and 1 #yStrength.

Animator_RacePiece.NAME: Race Piece
Animator_RacePiece.FLAVOR: Did you see that coming Mr. Mind Reader? Checkmate.
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose 1 card, transform 3 cards in your deck into 3 random cards of the same series.

Animator_PlumedHelmet.NAME: Plumed Helmet
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a curse or status, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

Animator_HeavyHalberd.NAME: Heavy Halberd
Animator_HeavyHalberd.FLAVOR: Ruling over death means ruling over life. Death is the climax of life. To have the best death, you must honor life.

Animator_OldCoffin.NAME: Old Coffin
DESCRIPTIONS: Starting from your 4th turn, apply a random #yDebuff to a random enemy at the start of your turn.

Animator_CursedBlade.NAME: Cursed Blade
Animator_CursedBlade.FLAVOR: It draws strength from the blood of its user, truly fitting for a vampire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison. Lose 1 Max HP at the end of each fight.

Animator_BattleDrones.NAME: Battle Drones
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you activate a synergy, deal 1 damage to a random enemy and gain 1 block.

Animator_EngravedStaff.NAME: Engraved Staff
Animator_EngravedStaff.FLAVOR: One of the most treasured possessions of the Guild.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, retain your highest cost card, it costs 1 less until played.

Animator_Buoy.NAME: Buoy
Animator_Buoy.FLAVOR: When it comes to speed I'm the best there is, swift like the island breeze!
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 4 turns, gain 6 Block and give all enemies 2 Block.
